response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This item holds immense value and significance, not only for its monetary worth but also for the unique benefits it offers. I understand its importance to you, as it is valued at $1,000,000 to you personally. My proposal is to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in your appreciation of the product's quality and potential impact. I believe this price presents an attractive proposition that allows us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
